verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty, <S%H410><s%> Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> due to His name; <S%H8034><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1927><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is upon the waters; <S%H4325><s%> The God <S%H410><s%> of glory <S%H9202><s%> thunders, <S%H7481><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is powerful, <S%H3581><s%> The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is majestic. <S%H1926><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> breaks <S%H7665><s%> the cedars; <S%H730><s%> Yes, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> breaks <S%H7665><s%> in pieces <S%H7665><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
And He makes Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> skip <S%H7540><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a calf, <S%H5695><s%> And Sirion <S%H8303><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> wild <S%H7214><s%> ox. <S%H7214><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hews <S%H2672><s%> out flames <S%H3852><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shakes <S%H9123><s%> the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shakes <S%H9123><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> makes the deer <S%H355><s%> to calve, <S%H9123><s%> And strips <S%H2834><s%> the forests <S%H9194><s%> bare, <S%H2834><s%> And in His temple <S%H1964><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> "Glory! <S%H9202><s%>"
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> [as King <S%H4428><s%>] at the flood; <S%H3999><s%> Yes, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> as King forever. <S%H5769><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> to His people; <S%H5971><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> with peace. <S%H7965><s%>
